name: Disable Visual Editor
author: Deepak chauhan(email : deepakchauha@gmail.com)

sections.description:
This plugin will disable the visual editor for selected page(s)/post(s).

Arbitrary section

You may provide arbitrary sections, in the same format as the ones above. This may be of use for extremely complicated
plugins where more information needs to be conveyed that doesn’t fit into the categories of “description” or
“installation.” Arbitrary sections will be shown below the built-in sections outlined above.

A brief Markdown Example
sections.installation:
1. Upload DisableVisualEditor to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.

short_description: Here is a short description of the plugin.
